General.Name: Ledtech Electronics Corp
General.Description: Ledtech Electronics Corp. produces and sells LED lamps and displays in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers standard lamps in various shapes and sizes; single, dual, three-, and four-digit displays, as well as alphanumeric, and dot matrix displays; chip LED products; SMD products; chip on board and side view backlight; high power products; holder type products; COB; lamp, SMD, and high-power IR LED; and rigid and flexible light strip and tube. It also provides UVC products, as well as low temperature, biological, and semiconductor yellow lightings. The company serves offices, schools, laboratories, banks, exhibition centers, supermarkets, and restaurants. Ledtech Electronics Corp. was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 542-5, Zhongzheng Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan
